About Me

Here are a few things to know about me...

BIO

I love building stuff whether it be Lego or puzzles, in another life I might have been involved in construction but in this life, I am a software developer. Building a fully functional application from nothing is just as fun. I have developed a passion for developing applications whether it be in mobile, web or desktop format, that can make life easier for people or improve a part of it. My current career goal is to become an invaluable software development team member and to improve my skills continuously so I can be able to contribute more meaningfully over time.
